item.description:
Join Members of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group and their Guests for a hibachi-style dinner at the "A" Restaurant we all voted to try! Save your appetite for this delicious dinner!

Quotes from reviews on Yelp:

Amy C.: "FINALLY Marshfield gets blessed with an amazing Japanese Steakhouse, dare I say, to rival any Japanese I've had in Boston. *Aoyama is sort of hidden in Webster Square in the center of Marshfield, but it is so worth the trip!* The hibachi-style experience is totally delicious, with really fresh ingredients, and it's completely entertaining. I've been here on numerous occasions, and enjoyed the steak, chicken and shrimp options with delicious made-to-order fried rice. Yummy yummy."

Kate H.: "The filet mignon was grilled to a true medium rare perfection. Fresh, well-prepared food and kind help have won me over. (Sushi lovers take note: there is an extensive selection of items on both the luncheon and dinner menus!)"

Prices range from $6-$17. Our entire party must be present to be seated. Due to the set-up of the table (if I remember correctly) you will generally be socializing with those seated in your immediate proximity (up to 2, possibly 3, seats away). Therefore, we have decided to meet a little bit earlier to give everyone the opportunity to meet and socialize while we are waiting for our table.

Aoyama Restaurant
14 Snow Road
Webster Square
Marshfield, MA 02050
5:30pm

Event Fee: $2pp / First Time Guests are FREE!
Min/Max: Max of 20 attendees.
Guests: Welcome! First-Time Guests are FREE!
Accessibility: This is handicap-accessible.
RSVP Deadline: Friday, February 22nd @ 4pm
Event Organizers: Estella and Kathy

Remember: Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:
Route 3 to Exit 12/Route 139 East.
Follow Route 139 East/Church Street approximately 3.6 miles.
Take a Right onto Webster Street.
Turn Right onto Snow Road.

Please use maps.google.com or mapquest.com for door-to-door directions.

We will do our best to update the directions with landmarks prior to the RSVP Deadline.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the Lobby area. All of us Organizers have our pictures posted so you will know who to look for. We'll probably have a clipboard for signing in as well.
item.why: It's the "A" Restaurant you voted for and the first time we have dined out for this type of cuisine.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: "A" Restaurant Dinner @ Aoyama
